item.title: 麦肯锡计划在咨询业放缓之际裁员数千人
item.description: 10 月下旬，麦肯锡公司的合伙人齐聚这家咨询业巨头的诞生地，鲍勃-斯特恩费尔斯（Bob Sternfels）发出了振奋人心的号召。"公司的最高管理者对数千名与会者说："在第二个世纪开始之际，我们将大干一场。【原文：As McKinsey & Co. partners gathered in the consulting giant’s birthplace in late October, Bob Sternfels delivered a rallying cry. “We will kick some ass as we start our second century,” the firm’s top executive told the thousands of attendees.】

item.title: 马克龙的拖延战术有可能使南方共同市场协议永远泡汤
item.description: 埃马纽埃尔-马克龙（Emmanuel Macron）力主推迟欧盟对南方共同市场（Mercosur）贸易协定的关键投票，这有可能使该协定彻底脱轨。【原文：Emmanuel Macron’s push to delay a key European Union vote on the Mercosur trade agreement risks derailing the pact altogether.】

item.title: 2026 年风险较高的小盘股将因增长前景而表现出色
item.description: 利率下降和经济增长的双重利好推动了小型股的快速反弹，小型股在今年大部分时间里都处于边缘化状态，华尔街的许多人认为这可能会推动风险较高的小型股在明年取得领先市场的涨幅。【原文：The fast-paced rally in small caps, sidelined for much of this year, has been fueled by a combination of falling interest rates and economic growth — dual tailwinds that many on Wall Street see as likely to propel the riskier group to market leading gains next year.】

item.title: Truecaller 2025 年业绩惨淡，再创历史新低
item.description: 本周一，瑞典来电显示平台 Truecaller AB 的抛售速度明显加快，因为有迹象表明该公司的广告收入仍处于低迷状态。【原文：This year’s selloff in Swedish caller-ID platform Truecaller AB accelerated markedly on Monday, on signs the firm’s ad revenues remain mired in the doldrums.】

item.title: 加拿大房价下跌，年底势头停滞不前
item.description: 加拿大房价在 11 月份出现下滑，因为进入寒冷季节后，市场在年中形成的暂时势头逐渐减弱。【原文：Canadian home prices dipped in November as the tentative momentum the market built through the middle of the year petered out heading into the colder months.】

item.title: 塔塔和 Infosys 将因特朗普的 10 万美元 H-1B 申请费而首当其冲
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）为从美国以外地区雇佣的新 H-1B 工人标价 10 万美元，这将对长期以来一直是两党攻击目标的 IT 外包和人员派遣行业产生惩罚性影响。【原文：President Donald Trump’s $100,000 price tag for new H-1B workers hired from outside the US will have punishing effects for the IT outsourcing and staffing industries that have long been a target of both parties.】

item.title: 韩国养老基金将采取灵活的外汇套期保值方法
item.description: 韩国国家养老金管理局表示，将采取灵活的外汇套期保值方法，以应对市场情况。【原文：South Korea’s National Pension Service said it will take a flexible approach to foreign-exchange hedging to respond to market conditions.】

item.title: 瑞典克朗数十年来的最佳涨势有望在 2026 年出现
item.description: 随着瑞典经济的复兴，瑞典克朗在今年击败所有主要货币后，2026 年的走势将十分强劲。【原文：Sweden’s krona looks set for a strong 2026 after beating all major currencies this year, as the country’s economy is enjoying a renaissance.】

item.title: 据说 MUFG 接近达成印度 Shriram Finance 股权交易
item.description: 据知情人士透露，三菱日联金融集团（Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group Inc.【原文：Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group Inc. is nearing a deal to buy a minority stake in India’s Shriram Finance Ltd., according to people familiar with the matter, the latest foreign bank seeking to build a presence in the world’s most populous country.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数创 2009 年以来最佳年景，英国小型企业举步维艰
item.description: 在英国富时 100 指数（FTSE 100）创下 16 年来最强劲表现之后，由于经济背景依然暗淡，以国内市场为主的英国股票似乎又将继续徘徊不前。【原文：After the strongest performance by the FTSE 100 in 16 years, the UK’s more domestically focused shares look set to muddle along for yet another spell as the economic backdrop remains bleak.】

item.title: 丹斯克银行称司法部对爱沙尼亚丑闻的调查已经结束
item.description: 丹斯克银行（Danske Bank A/S）表示，其与美国司法部的企业缓刑期已经结束，标志着解决欧洲最大洗钱丑闻之一的最后一步。【原文：Danske Bank A/S said its corporate probation with the U.S. Department of Justice has ended, marking the final step in resolving one of Europe’s biggest money-laundering scandals.】

item.title: 日本央行释放加息信号 工资上涨势头不减
item.description: 日本央行在一份报告中指出，尽管美国征收关税，但加薪势头依然不减，这也是有效巩固本周加息理由的一个关键考虑因素。【原文：The Bank of Japan indicated further progress on the wage front, a key consideration that effectively cements the case for a rate hike this week, with a report showing that momentum for pay increases remains intact despite US tariffs.】

item.title: 南非央行称南非通胀预期放缓，目标为 3
item.description: 南非央行称，在上个月正式通过 3% 的新通胀目标后，该目标已经帮助引导整个经济降低了预期。【原文：South Africa’s central bank credited its new 3% inflation target for already helping guide expectations lower across the economy, after the formal adoption of the goal last month.】

item.title: 瑞士在达成贸易协议后上调明年经济增长预期
item.description: 在与美国达成贸易协议的背景下，瑞士上调了明年的经济增长预期，同时在央行不再进一步放宽政策后，降低了对通胀的预期。【原文：Switzerland lifted the growth outlook for next year on the back of its trade deal with the US, while lowering expectations on inflation after the central bank refrained from further easing.】

item.title: 野村绫出价收购富士媒体 33.3% 的股份，加大对富士媒体的攻击力度
item.description: 激进投资者野村绫及其关联实体正准备增持富士媒体控股公司（Fuji Media Holdings Inc.【原文：Activist investor Aya Nomura and affiliated entities are preparing to increase their stake in Fuji Media Holdings Inc. to gain as much as one-third of voting rights, ratcheting up pressure on one of Japan’s most influential entertainment conglomerates.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利的威尔逊说，疲软的美国就业数据可能会提振股市
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）策略师迈克尔-威尔逊（Michael Wilson）认为，本周美国就业数据的温和疲软可能会助长股市的看涨情绪，因为这将提高美联储进一步降息的可能性。【原文：Moderate weakness in this week’s US job data could feed bullishness in equity markets as it would raise the probability of further interest rate cuts by the Federal Reserve, according to Morgan Stanley strategist Michael Wilson.】

item.title: 印度 11 月贸易逆差缩小，关税压力依然存在
item.description: 印度的贸易赤字在 10 月份扩大到创纪录的高点后，在 11 月份有所收窄，即使美国的高关税继续对出口商造成压力。【原文：India’s trade deficit narrowed in November after widening to a record high in October, even as high US tariffs continue to pressure exporters.】

item.title: 英国监管机构将放宽抵押贷款规则，允许推出更多产品
item.description: 英国金融监管机构正在权衡一系列针对该国抵押贷款市场的改革措施，旨在通过应对更灵活的工作模式和更长的预期寿命来拓宽抵押贷款市场。【原文：The UK’s financial regulator is weighing a series of reforms for the country’s mortgage market designed to widen access by responding to more flexible working patterns and longer life expectancies.】

item.title: 印度 Mebigo 实验室为 2 亿美元首次公开募股委任银行家
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度音频平台 Kuku FM 的运营商 Mebigo Labs Pvt.【原文：Mebigo Labs Pvt., the operator of India’s audio platform Kuku FM, has hired banks for an initial public offering that could raise as much as $200 million, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 印度北部浓雾导致 100 多架航班中断
item.description: 周一，浓雾笼罩了印度北部，导致主要机场运营受阻，旅客滞留，印度航空公司取消或推迟了数百个航班。【原文：Indian carriers canceled or delayed hundreds of flights Monday, as dense fog blanketed the country’s north, snarling operations at major airports and stranding passengers.】

item.title: 零售商遭遇史上最差一年后，WH Smith 的股息令人担忧
item.description: WH Smith Plc 的首席执行官即将离职，其业绩已被推迟了两次，而在这家备受困扰的零售商出现会计漏洞后，其股价正走向有史以来最糟糕的一年。下一步可能就是削减股息。【原文：WH Smith Plc’s CEO is on the way out, its results have been delayed twice and its shares are heading for their worst year on record after an accounting snafu at the embattled retailer. A dividend cut could be next.】

item.title: 日本央行加息押注增加，日元表现优于十国集团同业
item.description: 由于投资者加大了对日本央行将在本周晚些时候加息的押注，日元周一的表现优于十国集团同类货币。【原文：The yen outperforms its Group-of-10 peers on Monday as investors ramped up bets the Bank of Japan will hike interest rates later this week.】

item.title: 俄罗斯要求莫斯科欧洲清算公司提供 2,290 亿美元：塔斯社
item.description: 据国营塔斯社周一报道，俄罗斯银行在莫斯科提起诉讼，要求欧洲清算公司支付 18.2 万亿卢布（约合 2,290 亿美元）。【原文：The Bank of Russia filed a lawsuit in Moscow seeking 18.2 trillion rubles ($229 billion) from Euroclear, the state-run Tass news service reported Monday.】

item.title: 香港 IPO 大年将以最后一轮交易高峰收官
item.description: 香港首次公开募股市场红红火火，随着公司纷纷抢滩上市，今年将迎来至少四年来最繁忙的一个月。【原文：Hong Kong red-hot market for initial public offerings is set to close the year with its busiest month for listings in at least four years as companies rush to list their shares.】

item.title: 英国富时 100 指数将上涨，英镑保持稳定
中国独立炼油厂在制裁后以超低折扣购买俄罗斯石油
item.description: 在美国对俄罗斯石油公司（Rosneft PJSC）和卢克石油公司（Lukoil PJSC）实施制裁后，对俄罗斯ESPO原油的需求急剧下降。【原文：Russian ESPO crude was recently sold to at least one Chinese buyer at what traders say was the steepest discount this year, after demand for the grade tumbled following US sanctions on Rosneft PJSC and Lukoil PJSC.】
